question_sentence: The CDC cut its recommended isolation time for Americans who tested positive for COVID-19 from 10 days to:
Which of these recent college football bowl games wasn’t canceled due to COVID-19?
A Delta flight from Seattle to Shanghai turned around midair. According to the airline, why did the plane reverse course?
choices: Lack of visibility in the sky
Severe weather about 100 miles outside of Shanghai

question_sentence: Scientists in Egypt “digitally unwrapped” the 3,500-year-old mummy of which pharaoh?
Legendary NFL coach and broadcaster John Madden died this week. Which team did he win a Super Bowl with?
The trial of Ghislaine Maxwell, accused of luring teens to be sexually abused by Jeffrey Epstein, reached a verdict. Was she convicted?
Which company is reinstating a program that requires employees, including its CEO, to make deliveries at least once a month?
Former U.S. Senate Majority Leader Harry Reid died Tuesday at age 82. Who credited him for getting “most of what I got done”?
A 10-year-old girl in Minnesota asked Amazon Echo for an exercise. Her mom said the device recommended:
choices: A signature gymnastic move by Simone Biles
Watching a show on Amazon Prime

question_sentence: A tweet that went viral this week pointed out that the IRS is asking people to report these as income on their taxes.
choices: Earnings from any drugs they sold
